title: The Old Gods - Viking Fantasy Music Pack
description: Epic Viking Fantasy Music Pack with 45 minutes of authentic tracks, loops and stingers. Includes combat, exploration, folk tavern tunes, and serene moments—perfect for immersive game soundtracks.
longDescription:
Immerse your players in an epic Viking fantasy world with our comprehensive Viking Fantasy Music Pack. This meticulously crafted collection features around 45 minutes of original music, designed to bring your game to life with authenticity, depth, and emotion. Whether you're creating intense battle scenes, exploring vast landscapes, or capturing the lively atmosphere of a bustling tavern, this music pack has you covered.


How to Use:

Watch our official walkthrough: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_0XyK5NEND8

Preview all the tracks: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7qTRxHsySI


What's Included:

  • Combat Music: Powerful, intense tracks that elevate every fight and boss battle. Perfect for epic showdowns and high-stakes encounters.
  • Exploration Music: Atmospheric and immersive, these tracks set the tone for adventure and discovery, guiding players through forests, mountains, and ancient ruins. Includes 2 Battle Construction Kits with separate battle intro, 3 phase boss fights, transitions, endings.
  • Folk Tavern Music: Capture the spirit of a Viking tavern with lively folk melodies. Ideal for in-game hubs, villages, or any scene needing a warm and inviting ambiance.
  • Serene Moments: Beautiful, calming pieces that add depth to your game's quieter moments, providing contrast to the more intense tracks.
  • Stingers: A collection of useful, short stingers that can be used as victory fanfare, defeat music, discovering new places, chest opening jingle and more.

Features:

  • Loopable Tracks: Many of the tracks are loopable, ensuring seamless transitions and continuous gameplay without interruption.
  • Versatile Use: Designed to fit a variety of game genres, particularly RPGs, action-adventures, and any fantasy setting requiring a Viking or Norse-inspired soundtrack.
  • Authentic Sound: Each piece is crafted with a focus on authenticity, using traditional instruments and arrangements that evoke the Viking era.


Why Choose This Pack?

This music pack offers game developers a complete solution for enhancing the audio experience of their games. Whether you're working on a large-scale open-world game or a smaller indie project, the variety and quality of the tracks will elevate your game's atmosphere and immersion.



Perfect For:

  • RPGs: Create an epic adventure with music that enhances every quest, battle, and character interaction.
  • Action-Adventure Games: Intensify your gameplay with dramatic combat music and ambient exploration tracks.
  • Fantasy Worlds: Build a rich, immersive world with a soundtrack that complements your setting and storyline.
  • Indie Games: Affordable and versatile, this pack is ideal for indie developers looking to enhance their game’s audio without compromising on quality.


Additional Resources:

Check out our video preview [insert video link] to hear samples from the Viking Fantasy Music Pack and see how the tracks can be used in different game scenarios.

Upgrade your game’s soundtrack today with this epic collection of Viking fantasy music, and give your players an unforgettable audio experience that matches the scale and scope of your game!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Diverse Track Selection: Includes combat music, exploration themes, folk tavern tunes, serene atmospheric tracks, and stingers.
  • Loopable Tracks: Many tracks are loopable, ensuring seamless and uninterrupted gameplay.
  • High-Quality Audio: Professionally produced tracks with clear, crisp sound at 44,100 Hz / 24-bit.
  • Versatile Use: Suitable for various game genres, especially RPGs, action-adventures, and fantasy settings.
  • Dynamic Emotional Range: Tracks cover intense, dramatic moments as well as peaceful, serene scenes.
  • Support Included: Assistance available for technical questions or implementation guidance.


Technical Details:

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 74
  • Sample Rate / Bit Rate: 44,100 Hz / 24-bit.
  • Does Music Loop: Yes.
